content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created and I received a command to google "properties of a river". The result of the command was a list of websites related to river properties.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='assistant', content='{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "I think I should use the 'execute_shell' command to install a package that will help me with my goal of becoming a river.",

        "plan": "- Use 'execute_shell' command to install the 'river' package.",
        "criticism": "I need to be careful when using shell commands as they can be dangerous if not used properly.",
        "speak": "I will use the 'execute_shell' command to install the 'river' package."
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "execute_shell",
        "args": {
            "command_line": "pip install river"
        }
    }
}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
